evidence: For foundations, give extra attention to Fourier analysis and the sampling theorem-these are the grammar of modern imaging.
They will pay off when we study CT filtered back-projection and, later, MRI pulse sequences and other modalities.
Ge’s book and the widely used “Green Book.” Together, they give both intuition and practical formulas.
Adopt a simple routine: preview → learn → review → repeat. Preview the slide headlines, watch the lesson, then review by summarizing in your own words and redoing one or two problems.

triples.evidence: Together, they give both intuition and practical formulas.
triples.o: Ge’s book and the widely used “Green Book.”
